data.title: SIGNED TYPESCRIPT- QUOTE by Penzias, Arno Alan (1933-2024): Very Good + No Binding SIGNED ITEM
data.meta_description: SIGNED ITEM - No Binding - Condition: Very Good + - Penzias quote on 8"x8" bonded paper sheet w/one fold - SIGNED by Nobel Prize winner Dr. Arno Penzias: "All best wishes - Armo Penzias". Awarded Nobel Prize in Physics in 1978. - SIGNED TYPESCRIPT- QUOTE
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We accept payments by Visa & MasterCard accepted through ABE E-COMMERCE program (seller does not handle credit card processing directly). Media Mail and Priority Mail shipping available. Returns accepted, in same condition, within 10 days of receipt if item is not as described (please contact first). Scans available (please request by e-mail). No dealer discounts. Prices listed are firm---no 'best offer' inquiries please. Visa & MasterCard accepted through ABE E-COMMERCE program (seller does not...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or over-sized, we may request extra shipping. Also: overseas shipments of books valued over $100 may require request for extra postage since they will be shipped by Priority Mail which has tracking. Also: Please be patient since shipping times given are estimates only and delays in postal system (and customs for international orders) are possible--times given are not guaranteed delivery times. Orders over $200 will require signature confirmation with delivery.** Do not ship postal "OverNight Express"**. Also note: Do no accept or ship any item ordered Internationally that is valued under $65 or expensive items valued over $200 (not worth the risk to send expensive items overseas); and do not ship to certain countries due to past delivery problems- especially Central or South America; Africa etc.- overseas orders please contact first. No discounts. Prices listed are firm---no 'best offer' inquiries please
